column4: hello, is there any thing I can do to make my wireless connection more stable? the computer and the router are not moving and the signal strenght is just going down and going up, any ideas?
a combination of installing linux-backports-modules-wireless and updating my router firmware helped me fix such a problem
the package name has kernel-name extension. Try like this: linux-backports-modules-wireless-`uname -r`  I'm not sure if it has modules for your wireless adapter..
